Open Positions OpenTable is the leading supplier of reservation and customer relationship management solutions to the restaurant industry. We are currently recruiting talented, enthusiastic, and creative individuals. If you would like to apply for any of the openings posted below, please send us your résumé and a cover letter clearly identifying the desired position and your qualifications. Phone calls or recruiter inquiries are not welcome. OpenTable offers a competitive salary, stock options and benefits package. OpenTable is an equal opportunity employer.
Engineering
Senior QA Engineer (San Francisco) Description The Senior QA Engineer is responsible for finding all of the defects in complex features and products by designing test suites, organizing reviews and developing and executing tests cases. The ideal candidate requires minimal supervision and can develop work plans and tasks from high level goals. He or she can estimate and track project tasks and schedule, and is capable of leading small teams by example.
Responsibilities Plans, organizes, and leads testing efforts. Designs/develops test plans, suites and cases (both manual&automated) Leads group test plan and case reviews to ensure complete test coverage. Executes test cases efficiently and effectively with an eye for detail Communicates well with product, marketing and engineering groups. Organizes, leads and participates in meetings to accomplish key goals Estimates and tracks project tasks and schedule. Takes corrective action to ensure that goals are met. Produces documentation for products including test matrices, test design documents, cases and plans. Contributes to process improvement and participates in product / engineering spec reviews Communicates well with customers or partners; may deliver internal presentations.
Desired Experience Four year BS/BA degree preferred. 5+ years QA testing experience 2 years of recent work experience with, and solid understanding of SQL 2 years of work experience testing websites Solid understanding of Windows, networking, and internet fundamentals 2 years of work experience with client/server architecture and web server architecture Recent experience with automation and automated testing tools Strong interpersonal and written and verbal communication skills Is a role model; demonstrates a ‘can-do’ attitude toward work and applies extra effort as needed to achieve goals. Excellent communication and documentation skills are critically important Possesses ability to multi-task
